Articles.Content: Is it currently possible to change low altitude planet surface textures? AKA Texture replacer style? Or is it hard-coded? Thanks!

Doesn't Texture Replacer do exactly that?

No it doesn't. I'm pretty sure its hardcoded.

No it doesn't. I'm pretty sure its hardcoded.

But how does the Planet Factory mod assign the low altitude textures from hardcoded stock low-altitude texture set?

It doesn't.

Planet/moon textures are normal maps, not color maps, and assigned based on slope. Color is assigned by vertex color, which you set by various PQSMods.
Isn't the testing version of EVE make changes to the textures to the land?

Squad should have allowed modders to change land textures, as in RSS for example it is really hard to tell wherever you are moving on the land vehicle or not, textures are being stretched too much. Moreover, they are spectacularly ugly.
